alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:36PM EDT until August 12 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Northern Cambria County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 835 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belsano, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altoona, Hollidaysburg, Tyrone, Ebensburg, Nanty-Glo, Northern Cambria, Lakemont, Bellwood, Patton, Cresson, Gallitzin and Loretto. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 27 to 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
